sentence.Network_cn: 有人说这项政策往好里说是混乱不堪，往坏里说就是形同虚设。

sentence.Network_en: It was absolutely the worst food I have ever had.
sentence.Network_cn: 这绝对是我吃过的最糟糕的食物。

jx.jx_en_mean: in the most unpleasant, unimpressive, or unattractive state of which someone or something is capable
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在最坏的情况下（在某人最糟的时候）

lj.lj_ly: nothing's working at the moment, so I suppose you've seen us at our worst.
lj.lj_ls: 那时一切都不在运转，因此我觉得你看到的是我们最糟的时候。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 在最严重的情况下，在最坏的情况下

lj.lj_ly: at worst the injury could mean months in hospital.
lj.lj_ls: 在最坏的情况下，伤员得在医院躺上几个月。

lj.lj_ly: at worst the injury could mean months in hospital.
lj.lj_ls: 在最坏的情况下，伤员得在医院躺上几个月。

jx.jx_en_mean: do as much damage as one can (often used to express defiance in the face of threats)
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［挑战用语］有什么手段尽管使出来

lj.lj_ly: let them do their worst—he would never surrender.
lj.lj_ls: 让他们有什么手段尽管使出来吧——他永不投降。

phrase.cizu_name: get (或 have) the worst of it

jx.jx_en_mean: be in the least advantageous or successful position; suffer the most
jx.jx_cn_mean: 遭到失败；处于最不利的境地；大吃苦头

phrase.cizu_name: if the worst comes to the worst

jx.jx_en_mean: if the most serious or difficult circumstances arise
jx.jx_cn_mean: 如果事情坏到无可再坏，如果最坏的事发生；到一筹莫展的时候

jx.jx_en_mean: Under the most negative circumstances, estimation, or interpretation
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在最坏的形式下：在最恶劣的环境，在最保守的估计下，在最不利的解释下

lj.lj_ly: At worst, the storm will make us postpone the trip.
lj.lj_ls: 最坏的估计是暴风雨会使我们推迟行程

jx.jx_en_mean: To suffer a defeat or disadvantage.

phrase.cizu_name: get the worst of it 或 have the worst of it

lj.lj_ly: wanted to be elected in the worst way.

phrase.cizu_name: in the worst way【非正式用语】

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wierresta, wyrresta (adjective), wierst, wyrst (adverb), of Germanic origin; related to worse

entry.def: Worst is the superlative of bad .
Worst is the superlative of badly .
The worst is the most unpleasant or unfavourable thing that could happen or does happen.

example.ex: Though mine safety has much improved, miners' families still fear the worst...
example.tran: 尽管矿井的安全状况有了很大改善，矿工的家属仍然害怕最糟的情况会发生。

example.ex: The country had come through the worst of the recession.
example.tran: 该国已经度过了经济衰退最糟糕的时期。

entry.tran: (用于构成以 bad 和 badly 开头的复合形容词的最高级，如badly-affected的最高级是worst-affected)
entry.def: Worst is used to form the superlative of compound adjectives beginning with 'bad' and 'badly'. For example, the superlative of 'badly-affected' is 'worst-affected'.
You say worst of all to indicate that what you are about to mention is the most unpleasant or has the most disadvantages out of all the things you are mentioning.

example.ex: The people most closely affected are the passengers who were injured and, worst of all, those who lost relatives.
example.tran: 受影响最大的是受伤的乘客，那些失去亲人的乘客尤为甚。

entry.def: You use at worst or at the worst to indicate that you are mentioning the worst thing that might happen in a situation.

example.ex: At best Nella would be an invalid; at worst she would die...
example.tran: 内拉往好里说会落下残疾，往坏处说可能会生命不保。

example.ex: At the worst he would be there by the following night.
example.tran: 最不济他会在第二天晚上之前到那儿。

entry.tran: 在（心情、境况）最糟糕的时候
entry.def: When someone is at their worst, they are as unpleasant, bad, or unsuccessful as it is possible for them to be.

example.ex: This was their mother at her worst. Her voice was strident, she was ready to be angry at anyone.
example.tran: 这是他们的母亲情绪最坏之时，她说话咄咄逼人，随时会对任何人发火。

entry.tran: 如果发生最坏的情况（if worst comes to worst 主要用于美国英语）
entry.def: You use if the worst comes to the worst to say what you might do if a situation develops in the most unfavourable way possible. The form if worst comes to worst is also used, mainly in American English.

example.ex: If the worst comes to the worst I guess I can always ring Jean...
example.tran: 到了一筹莫展的时候，我想我总还是能给琼打电话。

example.ex: He was asked whether he would walk out if the worst came to the worst.
example.tran: 他被问到如果发生最坏的情况他是否会退席。

entry.tran: 不择手段；使出一切手段;有什么手段尽管使出来
entry.def: If someone does their worst, they do everything unpleasant that they can possibly do. You can say 'do your worst' to show someone that you are not frightened of what they may do.

example.ex: I think it was dangerous to say: look, we've got an army now — do your worst.
example.tran: 我觉得要是说“瞧，我们现在有一大群人——你有什么手段尽管使出来吧”，可能会引起麻烦。

means.word_mean: 2. the greatest damage or wickedness of which one is capable;

sentences.sentence: "so pure of heart that his worst is another man's best"

means.word_mean: 3. the weakest effort or poorest achievement one is capable of;

sentences.sentence: "it was the worst he had ever done on a test"
"He mopped up the floor with his opponents"

means.word_mean: 1. (superlative of `bad') most wanting in quality or value or condition;
1. to the highest degree of inferiority or badness;

sentences.sentence: "schools were the worst hit by government spending cuts"

list.explanation: [军队用语]最坏的设想，未来的最糟结果或出路

example.en: In the worst-case scenario, we're all dead.
example.zh: 那最坏的设想是我们大家全部死光。

auth_sentence.content: The worst side effect for me is the flashbacks.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The worst side effect for me is the flashbacks.

auth_sentence.content: It is the worst violence in almost a decade.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the worst violence in almost a decade.

auth_sentence.content: So hopefully I am over the worst of it.
auth_sentence.res_content: So hopefully I am over the worst of it.

Sentence.sentence: Worst of all, when her son, Ned, fell and injured his knee, she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help.
in the year to March, the worst slide since the Second World War
For most executives, this is the worst business environment they've ever seen.
percent, as 598000 jobs were slashed from US payrolls in the worst single-month decline since December, 1974.
Yet until recently the worst forecasts were almost exclusively linked to direct human activity, such as clear-cutting and burning for pastures or farms
The worst possible aspect of the Obama effect is that people could ignore his race altogether and continue to hold on to their old racial stereotypes.

sentences.en: She is the worst singer I know.
sentences.cn: 她是我所知道的最糟糕的歌手。

sentences.en: Manufacturing industry was worst affected by the fuel shortage.
sentences.cn: 燃料短缺制造业最受到影响。

means.word_mean: 最坏的部分[情况, 事情, 可能性等]

sentences.en: I was prepared for the worst when I heard the news.
sentences.cn: 我听到了消息, 心里已经想到了最坏的可能性。

jushi.english: The two worst players are all from that university .
jushi.chinese: 最差的两个选手都来自那所大学。

jushi.english: This is the worst storm for five years.
jushi.chinese: 这是五年来最厉害的暴风雨。

jushi.english: Simon is the worst one of all the boys I know.
jushi.chinese: 我认识的孩子中,西蒙是最坏的。
